subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Radio
Soccer
lead_paragraph: In most parts of the world, there is no future in broadcasting for soccer announcers who do not know how to bellow an impressive, long and loud call after a goal, so they work at it daily.
